refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the current working directory of the processor

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The cxo:cwd step returns a single c:result containing the current working directory. On systems which have no concept of a working directory, this step returns the empty sequence.
(This step is exactly duplicates the cwd attribute on the c:result from cxo:info; it's just for convenience.)
